labels.analysis: The MCP Server "Jimeng Image Generation Server" provides AI-powered image generation capabilities through the Jimeng AI service. Its primary functionality is to generate images from text prompts, allowing users to customize parameters and receive direct image URLs for easy display. This integrates seamlessly into applications needing advanced AI image creation tools.
labels.reasoning: The primary label "AI/ML Tools" is chosen because the server's core functionality revolves around generating images using AI, a key aspect of machine learning and artificial intelligence. The secondary label "Content Creation" is included because the tool is directly used for generating creative content (images). No custom label is needed as the functionality is well-covered by the predefined categories.

Generate images from text prompts with customizable parameters and receive direct image URLs for easy display. Enhance your applications with seamless access to advanced AI image creation tools.

tools.name: hello
tools.description: Deploy Server Jimeng Image Generation Server @c-rick/jimeng-mcp Try in Playground

server_info_crawled.python_sdk:
import mcp
from mcp.client.streamable_http import streamablehttp_client
import json
import base64

smithery_api_key = ""
url = f"https://server.smithery.ai/@c-rick/jimeng-mcp/mcp?api_key={smithery_api_key}"

async def main():
    # Connect to the server using HTTP client
    async with streamablehttp_client(url) as (read_stream, write_stream, _):
        async with mcp.ClientSession(read_stream, write_stream) as session:
            # Initialize the connection
            await session.initialize()
            # List available tools
            tools_result = await session.list_tools()
            print(f"Available tools: {', '.join([t.name for t in tools_result.tools])}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    import asyncio
    asyncio.run(main())
